description: Between its innovative baffle construction and ultra-durable fabrication, our best-selling Stretchdown™ is nothing short of an enigma. Combining the warmth of high-quality down insulation and resilience of a woven with the coverage and convenience of a changing towel, this poncho silhouette brings total comfort to your sweaty clothes swap-out and chilly oceanside endings to a long hike in.
name: Mountain Hardwear StretchDown Poncho
